column4: I tried to install a SLAX distribution on top of my Ubuntu one, and it didn't bother to partition, so I was left with Lilo in the MBR. I re-installed Grub using a guide I found on Ubuntu forums, and it now boots into Grub and tries to boot into Ubuntu, but gets hung up shortly after the splash screen. Can anyone help?
- none, just the splash screen goes away and turns into a blinking cursor.
- what partitions do you have /dev/hd?? and/or /dev/sd??
- Sure, I am new to IRC (seriously :) ) so what do I do?
- what IRC client are you using?
- look in a tab to your right
- backup your home partition and repartition
- I tried IMing you on this
- I have a PM window open right now, you haven't responded
- find my nick in the list on the right, and double-click it
